questionsData.title: Most plants prefer soil with neutral pH value.
Square, curved and round are examples of shapes.
" Turn over the soil" means " plough".
A hurricane is a weak storm with weak winds.
The strength of the earthquake is measured on the pH scale.
Layout is the design of a text.
An igloo is a house made of sand.
Things you use in cooking are ingredients.
A flow chart is a simple way of showing information.
The moon gets its light from the sun.
A group of connected words is called word set.
The text is mainly talking about ……….
questionsData.article: Sometime the best medicine is no medicine. It’s what doctors call a (placebo), Aplacebo doesn’t have any real medical effect, It may be just a sugar pill, But when a doctor gives a patient a placebo, it often helps. The effect of a placebo is both, psychological and physical. In fact, beliefs and feelings can have physical effects on yourbody, Sometimes it’s hard ta understand how a placebo works, Alot depends on the doctor and the way he or she talks to you. If the doctor seems very certain and uses a serious voice, the placebo is morelikely to help, and what helps is that there are two big adventages to placebo. First it has no side effects and second it is inexpensive. There are many reasons for doctors to use placebo, However, some doctors have doubts about how well a placebo really works. These doctors prefer to give real medicine. They don’t want to tell lies to their patients. Infact, the placebo’s effect only works if the doctor tells a lie. If the patient finds out the truth, how can he or she trust the doctor in the future?

questionsData.title: Yemen is a historical country. Not a lot of people visit it these days, …
The two words sounds the same, but they're spelled….
questionsData.explain_answer:
The word "differently" is the correct choice in this context.

  • differently is the adverb form  used to describe how the words are spelled.
  • Differ is the verb form, meaning "to be unlike or dissimilar."
  • Different is the adjective form, meaning "unlike or dissimilar."
  • Difference is a noun, meaning "the state or fact of being unlike or dissimilar."

questionsData.title: The firemen have ….. the children in the school
The results of DNA are ….. now as a clear evidence.
questionsData.explain_answer:
The results of DNA are taken now taken as clear evidence.

  • Present perfect: "Taken" indicates a completed action with a continuing impact on the present. The results of DNA analysis are a completed action, but their use as evidence continues in the present.

questionsData.title: He has a good experience of ……. with children.
Nobody came to see me while I ….. in hospital .
He is an intelligent man. The word " intelligent "is a/an ….
My will is ready. The word " will "is a/an ………...
Have the teacher …… you .
questionsData.explain_answer:
Use of have/get + infinitive

You use these verbs to replace other instruction words such as ask, tell or order.

Example:

Ask the boy to put away his bag.
→    Have the boy put away his bag.
→    Get the boy to put away his bag.
Note: With have, the infinitive is without to.

questionsData.title: I wish I …… fast Ramadan when I was very young.
If I …….time , l will visit all my friends .
